name: Michigan Pint Glass
description:
Love beer? Love Michigan?

Then these are the perfect pint glasses for you! Each pint glass is decorated with the state of Michigan and holds 20oz (room for foam).

These pint glasses are 7 inches tall and microwave and dishwasher safe.

The best part is these are for sale of an introductory price of $30 each until 12/31/13.

name: Wee Cup-Bicycle Design
description:
I WANT TO RIDE MY BICYCLE.

Do you have someone that is difficult to shop for? This is the perfect piece! Bikes are universal. People from young to old ride them. They were your first form of wheeled transportation. Do you remember the independence you felt?

Purchase this wee cup to remind you of simpler times. This porcelain wee cup has a hand drawn bicycle and is 3 and a half inches high and 2 and half inches wide. This wee cup holds 4oz.

It is microwave and dishwasher safe.

Available in additional colors. 
Drawings may vary slightly.

name: Extra Small House Canister
description:
HELLO CANISTER THAT LOOKS LIKE... 
A HOUSE!

This porcelain house canister adds a distinct style to your kitchen or bathroom and is great way to organize dry goods or clutter. Great for jewelry, sea salt, sugar cubes, chocolate covered coffee beans, or other candy.

This canister is glazed with red and white and has a simple building drawn on the front and back with a fire escape on the back.

This piece is 4 and a half inches high and two and a half inches wide and holds half a cup.

I would hand-wash this piece.

Start collecting your village today!

description:

This porcelain house canister adds a distinct style to your kitchen or bathroom and is great way to organize dry goods or clutter. Great for flour, teas bags, sugar, candies, dog treats, or cookies.

This canister is glazed with a vivid blue and red and has a simple window and door drawing.

This piece is 6" high and 3 1/2" wide and holds 1 and a half cups.

name: Oast House
description:
This piece is part of my architecture series. An Oast house or hop kiln is a building designed for kilning (drying) hops as part of the brewing process. Pretty cool huh?

I had to make this and put my own spin on it. Now-a-days most Oast houses and home for people not hops, but I love to think of the history behind the residence.

Great for the beer brewer in you life or baker. This piece is glaze with white, tangerine, and robin's egg blue. It measures 7" high and 4" wide and holds 3 cups.

name: Medium White Canister
description:
Looking for a one of a kind present?

This porcelain house canister adds a distinct style to your kitchen or bathroom and is great conversation piece.

This canister is glazed with a bright aqua and red and has a simple window and door drawing. This piece is 7" high and 4" wide. I would hand-wash this piece. This piece holds 2 and half cups.

Great for jewelry, teas bags, sugar, candies, dog treats, or other treats.

Start collecting your village today!

name: Teapot-House Design II
description:
HELLO TEAPOT THAT LOOKS LIKE... 
A HOUSE!

Why have a plain teapot when you can have a house teapot?

This piece is from my architecture series. I love tea and I love architecture, so this seemed like a natural combination.

This porcelain teapot is glazed with a subtle celadon, rosy red, and bright white. The handle is thick for a comfortable feel while pouring tea and the spout is cut sharply to allow for a fluid stream of tea. Where the spout connects to the body there are holes to strain loose tea.

This is the perfect gift for a tea drinker, teapot collector, or design enthusiast.

This piece measures 7" high, 7" wide, and 4" deep.

It holds 2 and a half cups or 20oz.

name: Teapot-House Design
description:
HELLO TEAPOT THAT LOOKS LIKE...
A HOUSE!

Why have a plain teapot when you can have a house teapot?

This piece is from my architecture series. I love tea and I love architecture, so this seemed like a natural combination.

This porcelain teapot is glazed with a vivid cobalt blue, subtle celadon, and bright white. The handle is thick for a comfortable feel while pouring tea and the spout is cut sharply to allow for a fluid stream of tea. Where the spout connects to the body there are holes to strain loose tea.

This is the perfect gift for a tea drinker, teapot collector, or design enthusiast.

This piece measures 7" high, 7" wide, and 4" deep.

It holds 2 and a half cups or 20oz.

name: Geodesic Dome Canister
description:
HELLO CANISTER THAT LOOKS LIKE...
A GEODESIC DOME!

Although Buckminster Fuller was not the original inventor of the geodesic dome, he did patent the mathematical work that popularized the geodesic dome.

Why have a plain canister when you can have your own geodesic dome?

This piece is from my architecture series. This piece is glazed green, a bright red door, and a white lid that has the geodesic dome pattern drawn on it.

Great for teas bags, sugar, candies, or a surprise cupcake!

This piece is 6" high and 5" wide and holds 2 cups.

I would hand-wash this piece.

name: Silo Canister
description: Hello canister that looks like a... silo! This piece is from my NEW architecture series. This piece is glazed with white and bright mint green. The stars that decorate the top of the silo are an idea taken from an actual silo in Southwestern Michigan. This piece is 7" high and 4" wide. I would hand-wash this piece. Pin It Great for teas bags, sugar, candies, or other treats.

name: White Round Barn Garlic Keeper
description: Hello canister that looks like a... round barn! This piece is from my NEW architecture series. This piece is glazed with a calming clear. The interior is white, while the lid (roof) is finished with light celadon. The barn door is bright aqua. This barn is my favorite because it is a garlic keeper and I am often told I eat so much garlic I reek of it. Oh well, here is my homage to garlic! This piece will hold 2 bulbs of garlic. This piece is 4" high and 4" wide. I would hand-wash this piece. Great garlic!

name: Porcelain Flower Shoppe Vase
description: On the northern side of Kalamazoo, MI there are numerous greenhouses leftover from being the celery capital of the world, but the most fascinating was the old glass greenhouse. It was there years ago and has now been torn down. When I would drive by I would imagine owning my own flower shop with an adjacent glass greenhouse. Someday. This pieced is glaze with a cobalt blue and the flower shop is robin's egg blue. 5"H X 4"W

name: Small Plate-city design
description:
ARE YOU A COUNTRY MOUSE OR A CITY MOUSE?

For some, it is definitely one or the other. For me, I sometimes feel like a city mouse that lives in the country. Don't get me wrong I love living in the country, but I love visiting the city. Capture the excitement of the city skyline with this simple plate.

This porcelain plate has hand drawn buildings. It is glazed with cobalt blue and mint green.

This porcelain plate measures 7" wide and is also microwave and dishwasher safe.

Additional colors available.

name: Mug-Country Mouse City Mouse Design
description:
ARE YOU A COUNTRY MOUSE OR A CITY MOUSE?

For some, it is definitely one or the other. For me, I sometimes feel like a city mouse that lives in the country. Don't get me wrong I love living in the country, but I love visiting the city.

Now you can have it all-COUNTRYPOLITAN, a beautiful balance between city style and rustic simplicity.

I make each mug and draw each building with an underglaze pencil. This porcelain mug is glazed with robin's egg blue. Make sure and look for the mouse that is hiding.

This porcelain mug measures 4" X 3" and holds 10oz., it is also microwave and dishwasher safe.

Additional colors are available. Drawings may vary slightly.

Enjoy!

description:

This porcelain bowl measures 5"W X 3"H, it is also microwave and dishwasher safe.

Enjoy!

name: Small Wall Tile-City Mouse Design
description:
CAN'T MAKE IT TO THE CITY THIS WEEKEND? NOW YOU CAN.

This tile is for the city mouse in you. This piece has two towering skyscrapers drawn on that twinkle at night.
I drew a cityscape on this porcelain wall tile and it has a notch in the back for easy wall hanging. It measures 4" wide and 8" tall.

This colorful tiles include pea green, robin's egg blue, bright coral red, asphalt gray, and will brighten any room!

name: Small Wall Tile-Country Mouse Design
description:
CAN'T MAKE IT THE COUNTRY THIS WEEKEND? NOW YOU CAN.

This wall tile was made for the country mouse in you.  Drawn on this tile is a quaint country home with it's still standing windmill. Can you smell the fresh air?

This colorful tiles include robin's egg blue, red, and lime green, and is colorful addition to any wall.

It measures 4" wide and 8" tall.

name: Large Bowl-Flower Design
description:
As a child, I used to garden with my mom a lot. She taught me about flowers and let me get dirty planting and weeding. One year she gave me my own section of garden and let me plant some flowers I wanted. I chose poppies! They were so unique-papery and soft, orange-ish red and black, and fuzzy.

Those poppies are still at my mom's house 20+ years later. When they bloom she calls me and we go and look at the poppies.

This bowl honors those poppies. A perfect piece for serving, display, or a gift.

This porcelain bowl is glazed with a bright red, robin's egg blue, and lime green.

This piece is microwave and dishwasher safe and measures 7" X 4 1/2". It holds 6 cups.

name: Sugar and Creamer Set
description:
As a child, I used to garden with my mom a lot. She taught me about flowers and let me get dirty planting and weeding. One year she gave me my own section of garden and let me plant some flowers I wanted. I chose poppies! They were so unique-papery and soft, orange-ish red and black, and fuzzy.

Those poppies are still at my mom's house 20+ years later. When they bloom she calls me and we go and look at the poppies.

This set honors those poppies. Even if you don't drink coffee this piece is great for sugar and cream on fresh fruit and also syrup and powdered sugar on breakfast treats.

This piece is microwave and dishwasher safe and measures 8" X 3" X 5".

name: Mug-Cloud Design
description:
BRILLIANT BLUE SKIES

In South Western Michigan, seeing a blue sky is rare between November and April from the overcast sky due to Lake Michigan.

That's what makes the blue of the summer sky so magical. Capture those brilliant blue skies everyday with this mug.

This porcelain mug has my playful cloud design drawn around it to brighten any day. A perfect addition to any home or as a cheerful gift.

This piece is glazed with food safe clear.

The mug measures 4"H X 3"W and is microwave and dishwasher safe and holds 10 oz.

Cloud drawings may vary slightly.

name: small bowl-cloud design
description:
TAKE TIME TO WATCH THE CLOUDS.

In South Western Michigan, seeing a blue sky is rare between November and April from the overcast sky due to Lake Michigan.

That's what makes the blue of the summer sky so magical. Don't you like watching big fluffy clouds float by in the sky? It's like the clouds are smiling at you, telling you to slow down.

This porcelain bowl has my playful cloud design drawn around it to brighten any day. A perfect addition to any home or as a cheerful gift.

The bowl measures 3"H X 4"W and is microwave and dishwasher safe.

name: Medium Bowl-Cloud Design
description:
WHAT DO YOU SEE IN THE CLOUDS?

In South Western Michigan, seeing a blue sky is rare between November and April from the overcast sky due to Lake Michigan.

That's what makes the blue of the summer sky so magical. Don't you like watching big fluffy clouds float by in the sky? It's like the clouds are smiling at you, sometimes frowning.

This porcelain bowl has my playful cloud design drawn around it to brighten any day. A perfect addition to any home or as a cheerful gift.

The bowl measures 4"H X 5"W and is microwave and dishwasher safe.
